p: On the service-level, we recommend limiting all in-person service meetings and shifting to remote video-meeting. This includes eliminating large team rounds in favor of having individual trainees staff cases with individual attendings to prevent an inadvertent multiple-member exposure event. Finally, we suggest staggering staff so that certain staff are “on reserve” providing telephone support, supervision, and other services from home while other consultants are in-hospital. Staff on our service are encouraged to bring clothing changes or wear in-hospital scrubs to prevent contamination. Finally, consider limiting consultation on infectious COVID-19 patients to a small number of low-risk volunteer consultants to prevent unnecessary exposure of the entire service [ 23].
